mapper.sql: id, name, type, url, path, component, icon_cls, parent_id, enabled, is_delete, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT re1.*, re2.id AS id2, re2.id AS id2, re2.url AS url2, re2.path AS path2, re2.type AS type2, re2.component AS component2, re2.name AS name2, re2.icon_cls AS icon_cls2, re2.parent_id AS parent_id2, re2.enabled AS enabled2, re2.is_delete AS is_delete2, re2.gmt_create AS gmt_create2, re2.gmt_modified AS gmt_modified2 FROM t_admin_role ar, t_role r, t_role_resource rr, t_resource re1, t_resource re2 WHERE re1.id = re2.parent_id AND ar.role_id = r.id AND r.id = rr.role_id AND rr.resource_id = re2.id AND re2.enabled = TRUE AND re1.type != 2 AND re2.type != 2 AND ar.admin_id = #{adminId} ORDER BY re2.id

SELECT DISTINCT re1.*, re2.id AS id2, re2.id AS id2, re2.url AS url2, re2.path AS path2, re2.type AS type2, re2.component AS component2, re2.name AS name2, re2.icon_cls AS icon_cls2, re2.parent_id AS parent_id2, re2.enabled AS enabled2, re2.is_delete AS is_delete2, re2.gmt_create AS gmt_create2, re2.gmt_modified AS gmt_modified2 FROM t_employee_role er, t_role r, t_role_resource rr, t_resource re1, t_resource re2 WHERE re1.id = re2.parent_id AND er.role_id = r.id AND r.id = rr.role_id AND rr.resource_id = re2.id AND re2.enabled = TRUE AND AND re1.type != 2 AND re2.type != 2 AND er.employee_id = #{employeeId} ORDER BY re2.id

SELECT DISTINCT res.*, r.id AS rid, r.`name` AS rname, r.name_zh AS rname_zh, r.is_delete AS ris_delete, r.gmt_create AS rgmt_create, r.gmt_modified AS rgmt_modified FROM t_role r, t_role_resource rr, t_resource res WHERE r.id = rr.role_id AND rr.resource_id = res.id AND res.enabled = TRUE ORDER BY res.id

SELECT res.* FROM t_admin_role ar, t_role r, t_role_resource rr, t_resource res WHERE ar.role_id = r.id AND r.id = rr.role_id AND rr.resource_id = res.id AND res.enabled = TRUE AND res.type = 2 AND res.parent_id = #{parentId} AND ar.admin_id = #{userId} ORDER BY res.id

SELECT res.* FROM t_employee_role er, t_role r, t_role_resource rr, t_resource res WHERE er.role_id = r.id AND r.id = rr.role_id AND rr.resource_id = res.id AND res.enabled = TRUE AND res.type = 2 AND res.parent_id = #{parentId} AND er.employee_id = #{userId} ORDER BY res.id
